sentences.en: " The trumpet of a prophecy! 0 Wind, If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind? "
sentences.cn: 把昏睡的大地唤醒吧! 要是冬天已经来了, 西风呵, 春日怎能遥远?

sentences.en: A prophet made a prophecy that the kingdom would fall.
sentences.cn: 一位预言家预言那个王国将要灭亡.

sentences.en: Apollo was the Greek god of the arts, prophecy, medicine and light.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗是希腊神话中主管艺术 、 预言 、 医药和光明之神.

sentences.en: Fear of failure can become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
sentences.cn: 害怕失败可能会真的导致失败。

sentences.en: His prophecy has now come true.
If that isn't prophecy, what is it?
sentences.cn: 这不是天机, 是什么?

sentences.en: If you expect to fail, you will fail. It's a self-fulfilling prophecy .
sentences.cn: 你如果预期失败，就会失败。这是一种自我应验的预测。

sentences.en: It is a self - fulfilling prophecy to assume that your information workers are untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 它是个 自以为是 的预言,认为你的信息工作者是不值得信任的.

sentences.en: Now Henry had created a selffulfilling prophecy.
sentences.cn: 现在亨利作出了个能自行实现的预言.

sentences.en: She had the gift of prophecy.
The prophecy has unfortunately come true.
The youth, too, fulfilled the prophecy.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻人，同样地，让预言说中了。

sentences.en: This prophecy has now been amply fulfilled.
sentences.cn: 这个预言今天已完全成为现实了.

trans.tran_en: a statement that something will happen in the future, especially one made by someone with religious or magic powers
